name: Looperer
description:
Deep in space a little robot tries to escape its enclosure inside of a crystal circle.

Help him find its way out of this seamless loop.

Controls:
-Arrow Keys/WASD - Control the robot.
-Space Key - Jump.
-Esc Key - Pause Menu.

Team
